text: Silver Lake State Park is an state park located along NH Route 122 on the northern shore of Silver Lake in the town of Hollis, New Hampshire. The park offers swimming at a sandy beach with a bathhouse, picnicking, and playground equipment, and the rental of kayaks and paddle boats. ==References== ==External links== *Silver Lake State Park New Hampshire Department of Natural and Cultural Resources Category:State parks of New Hampshire Category:Parks in Hillsborough County, New Hampshire
title: Silver Lake State Park (New Hampshire)
